verses.verseStringB: In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Their security during winter and summer journeys.
Let them worship the Lord of this House.

verses.verseString: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُمْ مِنْ جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُمْ مِنْ خَوْفٍ
verses.verseStringB: Who has fed them against hunger, and secured them against fear.
